Title: Requires landlords to ensure rental properties are equipped with utility services prior to renting such properties
Summary: Requires landlords to ensure rental properties are equipped with utility services prior to renting such properties; requires landlords to keep utility services connected in between tenants.
LawCode: Amd ยง235-b, add ยง235-i, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring landlords to ensure rental properties are equipped with utility services prior to renting such properties
